segments.text: Excuse me.My bag was stolen.Will you help me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just about half an hour ago .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell me where it happened and how ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes.It was just when I was walking in the park . I saw some children with a newspaper .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That happens often these days.Well , please fill in this " Report of Theft " .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I want to get in touch with the Chinese Embassy , because my passport was in the stolen bag !
segments.speaker: S1
